Rec. Check Apprehended/Bocated By SPI M. Strayhorn To: PI'S W. Miller - R. Beasley Immigration Record Criminal Record 1 PREVIOUS LAST ARTESTA, N.M. VR PRESIDIO 1964 CLAIMS NONE Name, Address and Nationality of Spouse (Maiden Name, if appropriate) Number & Nationality of Minor Children Ausucion LERMA same as above MEXICO 2 Mexico Father's Name, and Nationality and Address, if Known Mother's Present and Maiden Names, Nationality, and Address, if Known Luis CORRALES Mexico DEAD Angela MESA DEAD Mexico Property in U. S. Not in Immediate Possession Deportation Charge(s) (Code Words) NONE SEE ATTACHED I-43 ROTEN Name and Address of (Last) (Current) U. S. Employer From: To: NONE Narrative (Outline particulars under which alien located/apprehended and furnish details re time, place and manner of last entry) FORMER BRACERO Subject alien last entered the United States intex to seek employment and try to arrange his resident papers. He had contacted a Mr. Montoya, 412 S. Guadalupe, Carlsbad, N.M. and ask him to help him. Mr. Montoya was under the impression that subjects parents had become citizens of the US through Naturalization. Aliens file was check and a sworn statement dated 9-9-64 showed that the subjects mother had never lived in the US and that his father had worked in the US for ten years and returned to Mexico. Alien was located at the above address and he stated that his father was a resident alien and had never naturalized to his knowledge and that he was not sure about his mothers status, except that she had never lived in the US. After entry subject walked to a highway caught a ride with a truck to Carlsbad. I-274 ,193mg (Continue on Reverse) File Patrol Inspect and Title) DISTRIBUTION SEC Received (subject and documents) (report of interview) from 10 Officer: B. Beasley November 1st 1966 at 9:20 M.
